snippet.title: Steamed Hams: The Graphic Adventure
snippet.description:
This is an ACTUAL FANGAME you can download here:
https://gamejolt.com/games/SteamedHams/673130


CREDITS:

MASSIVE thanks to the AGS Team for the creation of Adventure Game Studio!!!

Tumbleweed game template by abstauber

AGS engine Web port by eri0o (https://adventuregamestudio.co.uk/forums/index.php?topic=59164)

Audio and story from 22 Short Films About Springfield (obviously)

Character sprites based on Simpsons Arcade, ripped by Random Talking Bush

Simpsonfont by Sharkshock

Some background art based on Maniac Mansion (NES)

Steamed Hams midi base from onlinesequencer.net (https://onlinesequencer.net/849766)

Simpsons midi from midisfree.com (https://midisfree.com/download/simpsons-the-the-simpsons-theme-mid)

Some audio from Steamed Hams but without music by Quentin T. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dRAp_CVWLzg)

Water audio from Maniac Mansion (Enhanced)

Fire animation adapted from Day of the Tentacle

Some audio also from Day of the Tentacle
